Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) has become an indispensable solid electrolyte material in modern solid oxide fuel and electrolysis cells (SOFCs/SOECs) as well as oxygen sensors.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: The oxygen ionic conductivity of YSZ is among the highest known so far.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: For energy efficiency optimization of SOFCs and lowering the high-temperature degradation of electrodes, the oxygen ionic conductivity needs to be further enhanced.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: This would allow for a reduction in application temperature.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: Despite extensive regular point defect-doping strategies, this key issue remains unsolved.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: Here, we investigate the role of mechanically induced dislocations (line-defects) on electrical conductivity and oxygen transport in bulk YSZ.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: An advanced mechanical deformation approach is employed to generate distinctly aligned dislocation-rich and -deficient regions.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: The in-depth electrical characterization of these regions exhibited highly conducting effects of dislocation-induced strain inside the bulk material.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: Furthermore, targeted oxygen tracer diffusion experiments prove enriched oxygen incorporation within the dislocation bundles.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia

Sentencas: Therefore, the potential of mechanically induced dislocations is elucidated as a design element to tune the bulk ionic transport in YSZ.
Titulo: Dislocation-Mediated Oxygen-Ionic Conductivity in Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia
